post.title: Talking about data visualization in Al Jazeera
post.author: Alberto Cairo
post.content: Al Jazeera's Tariq Nafi interviewed Mona Chalabi (who appears making one of her paintings!), myself, and some other people about how data visualization affects our perception of reality. Watch it below; the segment begins at around 14':
